summary.span: 代表根據索引鍵的雜湊程式碼，所整理的索引鍵/值組集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of key/value pairs that are organized based on the hash code of the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個項目是儲存在索引鍵/值組物件。Each element is a key/value pair stored in a object. 金鑰不能是`null`，但是值可以是。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我們不建議您改用`Hashtable`開發新的類別。We don't recommend that you use the `Hashtable` class for new development. 相反地，我們建議您先使用一般類別。Instead, we recommend that you use the generic class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 不應使用非泛型集合](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md)GitHub 上。For more information, see [Non-generic collections shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) on GitHub. 做為索引鍵所使用的物件才能覆寫方法 (或介面) 和方法 (或介面)。The objects used as keys by a are required to override the method (or the interface) and the method (or the interface). 方法和介面的實作必須處理區分大小寫相同的方式;否則，可能不正確地運作。The implementation of both methods and interfaces must handle case sensitivity the same way; otherwise, the might behave incorrectly. 例如，建立，您必須使用類別 (或任何不區分大小寫實作) 與類別 (或任何不區分大小寫實作)。For example, when creating a , you must use the class (or any case-insensitive implementation) with the class (or any case-insensitive implementation). 此外，這些方法必須產生相同的結果時的索引鍵存在於相同的參數呼叫時。Furthermore, these methods must produce the same results when called with the same parameters while the key exists in the . 替代方式是使用建構函式與參數。An alternative is to use a constructor with an parameter. 只需參考相等的繼承實作是否包含索引鍵相等與否和即已足夠。If key equality were simply reference equality, the inherited implementation of and would suffice. 索引鍵物件必須是不可變，只要當做索引鍵中使用。Key objects must be immutable as long as they are used as keys in the . 若要新增的項目時，項目放入貯體根據索引鍵的雜湊碼。When an element is added to the , the element is placed into a bucket based on the hash code of the key. 後續的查閱索引鍵使用索引鍵的雜湊程式的碼搜尋中只有一個特定的貯體，因此可大幅減少要尋找的項目所需的索引鍵比較的數量。Subsequent lookups of the key use the hash code of the key to search in only one particular bucket, thus substantially reducing the number of key comparisons required to find an element. 負載因數判斷雜湊桶項的最大比例。The load factor of a determines the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 較小的載入因數會更快的平均查閱次數，但是相對地增加的記憶體耗用量。Smaller load factors cause faster average lookup times at the cost of increased memory consumption. 預設的載入因數，1.0 的通常會提供速度與大小之間的最佳平衡。The default load factor of 1.0 generally provides the best balance between speed and size. 也可以是不同的負載因數時指定建立。A different load factor can also be specified when the is created. 當項目加入至，實際的載入因數的會增加。As elements are added to a , the actual load factor of the increases. 當實際的載入因數到達指定的載入因數，貯體數目會自動增加至超過兩次的目前數目最小質數貯體。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets in the is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 每個索引鍵的物件，在必須提供自己的雜湊函式，藉由呼叫可存取。Each key object in the must provide its own hash function, which can be accessed by calling . 不過，任何物件會實作可以傳遞至建構函式，和雜湊函式，用於資料表中的所有物件。However, any object implementing can be passed to a constructor, and that hash function is used for all objects in the table. 營運是的項目數可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量視需要透過重新配置。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. **僅限.NET framework:** 針對非常大型物件，您可以藉由設定增加到 64 位元系統上的 2 億個元素的最大容量`enabled`屬性[ `` ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md)組態項目`true`中執行階段環境。**.NET Framework only:** For very large objects, you can increase the maximum capacity to 2 billion elements on a 64-bit system by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md) configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`For Each` Visual Basic 中) 傳回集合中的項目類型的物件。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 因為每個項目的是索引鍵/值組，項目型別不是索引鍵的類型或值的類型。Since each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反地，項目型別是。Instead, the element type is . 例如: For example: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/cpp/remarks.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/cs/remarks.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/vb/remarks.vb#01)] `foreach`陳述式是一個包裝函式只允許讀取，不寫入至集合的列舉值。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. 因為序列化和還原序列化的列舉值可能會導致要成為重新排序的項目，就無法繼續列舉型別，而不需呼叫方法。Because serializing and deserializing an enumerator for a can cause the elements to become reordered, it is not possible to continue enumeration without calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 因為可繼承索引鍵，並變更其行為，其絕對唯一性無法保證使用比較方法。Because keys can be inherited and their behavior changed, their absolute uniqueness cannot be guaranteed by comparisons using the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立、 初始化和執行各種功能至，以及如何列印出其索引鍵和值。The following example shows how to create, initialize and perform various functions to a and how to print out its keys and values. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#00](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/cpp/hashtable_example.cpp#00)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/cs/hashtable_example.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/vb/hashtable_example.vb#00)] [!code-powershell[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#00](~/samples/snippets/powershell/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.hashtable.class/ps/hashtable.ps1#00)]

threadsafe.span: 為使用多個讀取器執行緒和單一寫入執行緒安全執行緒。

span.span: is thread safe for use by multiple reader threads and a single writing thread.

threadsafe.span: 它是執行緒安全多執行緒使用時，只有其中一個執行緒執行寫入 （更新） 作業，以達到無鎖定的讀取，前提是寫入器序列化為。

span.span: It is thread safe for multi-thread use when only one of the threads perform write (update) operations, which allows for lock-free reads provided that the writers are serialized to the .

threadsafe.span: 若要支援多個寫入器上的所有作業必須透過包裝函式所傳回方法，提供沒有執行緒讀取物件。

span.span: To support multiple writers all operations on the must be done through the wrapper returned by the method, provided that there are no threads reading the object.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雜湊資料表的容量用來計算最佳的載入因數為基礎的雜湊資料表貯體數目。A hash table's capacity is used to calculate the optimal number of hash table buckets based on the load factor. 會自動增加容量，會視需要而定。Capacity is automatically increased as required. 載入因數是雜湊桶項的最大比例。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 較小的載入因數表示更快的查閱，但是相對地增加的記憶體耗用量。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 當實際的載入因數達到指定的載入因數時，貯體數目會自動增加到大於兩次目前的貯體數目最小質數。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼物件。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the object. 預設雜湊碼提供者是索引鍵的實作。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 預設比較子是索引鍵的實作。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 的作業。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用雜湊表建立為不同建構函式，並示範中的雜湊表中，行為的差異，即使每個包含相同的項目。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctor/CPP/hashtable_ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctor/CS/hashtable_ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctor/VB/hashtable_ctor.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始容量設定為來源字典中的項目數。The initial capacity is set to the number of elements in the source dictionary. 容量會自動視需要增加的負載因數為基礎。Capacity is automatically increased as required based on the load factor. 載入因數是雜湊桶項的最大比例。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 較小的載入因數表示更快的查閱，但是相對地增加的記憶體耗用量。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 當實際的載入因數達到指定的載入因數時，貯體數目會自動增加到大於兩次目前的貯體數目最小質數。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼物件。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the object. 預設雜湊碼提供者是索引鍵的實作。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 預設比較子是索引鍵的實作。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 新的項目都會依照相同的順序，在其中將列舉值逐一查看物件。The elements of the new are sorted in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the object. 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是中的項目數`d`參數。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `d` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用雜湊表建立為不同建構函式，並示範中的雜湊表中，行為的差異，即使每個包含相同的項目。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始容量設定為來源字典中的項目數。The initial capacity is set to the number of elements in the source dictionary. 容量會自動視需要增加的負載因數為基礎。Capacity is automatically increased as required based on the load factor. 載入因數是雜湊桶項的最大比例。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 較小的載入因數表示更快的查閱，但是相對地增加的記憶體耗用量。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 當實際的載入因數達到指定的載入因數時，貯體數目會自動增加到大於兩次目前的貯體數目最小質數。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 物件包含雜湊程式碼提供者和比較子。The object includes both the hash code provider and the comparer. 如果用於建構函式，做為索引鍵中使用的物件物件不需要覆寫和方法。If an is used in the constructor, the objects used as keys in the object are not required to override the and methods. 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 預設雜湊碼提供者是索引鍵的實作。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 預設比較子是索引鍵的實作。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 啟用的案例，例如執行查詢，使用不區分大小寫的字串。The enables scenarios such as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings. 新的項目都會依照相同的順序，在其中將列舉值逐一查看物件。The elements of the new are sorted in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the object. 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是中的項目數`d`參數。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `d` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用雜湊表建立為不同建構函式，並示範中的雜湊表中，行為的差異，即使每個包含相同的項目。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 雜湊資料表的容量用來計算最佳的載入因數為基礎的雜湊資料表貯體數目。A hash table's capacity is used to calculate the optimal number of hash table buckets based on the load factor. 會自動增加容量，會視需要而定。Capacity is automatically increased as required. 載入因數是雜湊桶項的最大比例。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 較小的載入因數表示更快的查閱，但是相對地增加的記憶體耗用量。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 當實際的載入因數達到指定的載入因數時，貯體數目會自動增加到大於兩次目前的貯體數目最小質數。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼物件。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the object. 預設雜湊碼提供者是索引鍵的實作。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 預設比較子是索引鍵的實作。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 因為序列化和還原序列化的列舉值可能會導致要成為重新排序的項目，就無法繼續列舉型別，而不需呼叫方法。Because serializing and deserializing an enumerator for a can cause the elements to become reordered, it is not possible to continue enumeration without calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始容量設定為來源字典中的項目數。The initial capacity is set to the number of elements in the source dictionary. 容量會自動視需要增加的負載因數為基礎。Capacity is automatically increased as required based on the load factor. 載入因數是雜湊桶項的最大比例。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 較小的載入因數表示更快的查閱，但是相對地增加的記憶體耗用量。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 當實際的載入因數達到指定的載入因數時，貯體數目會自動增加到大於兩次目前的貯體數目最小質數。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼物件。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the object. 預設雜湊碼提供者是索引鍵的實作。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 預設比較子是索引鍵的實作。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 自訂的雜湊程式碼提供者和自訂比較子啟用的案例，例如執行查詢，使用不區分大小寫的字串。The custom hash code provider and the custom comparer enable scenarios such as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings. 新的項目都會依照相同的順序，在其中將列舉值逐一查看物件。The elements of the new are sorted in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the object. 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是中的項目數`d`參數。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `d` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用雜湊表建立為不同建構函式，並示範中的雜湊表中，行為的差異，即使每個包含相同的項目。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時物件。Specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the object. 容量會自動視需要增加的負載因數為基礎。Capacity is automatically increased as required based on the load factor. 載入因數是雜湊桶項的最大比例。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 較小的載入因數表示更快的查閱，但是相對地增加的記憶體耗用量。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 當實際的載入因數達到指定的載入因數時，貯體數目會自動增加到大於兩次目前的貯體數目最小質數。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 預設雜湊碼提供者是索引鍵的實作。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 預設比較子是索引鍵的實作。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 自訂的雜湊程式碼提供者和自訂比較子啟用的案例，例如執行查詢，使用不區分大小寫的字串。The custom hash code provider and the custom comparer enable scenarios such as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings. 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是`capacity`參數。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the `capacity` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用雜湊表建立為不同建構函式，並示範中的雜湊表中，行為的差異，即使每個包含相同的項目。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. summary.span: 新 物件的初始容量等於複製的項目數，並且此物件使用指定的載入因數、雜湊程式碼提供者和比較子。

span.span: The new object has an initial capacity equal to the number of elements copied, and uses the specified load factor, hash code provider, and comparer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始容量設定為來源字典中的項目數。The initial capacity is set to the number of elements in the source dictionary. 容量會自動視需要增加的負載因數為基礎。Capacity is automatically increased as required based on the load factor. 載入因數是雜湊桶項的最大比例。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 較小的載入因數表示更快的查閱，但是相對地增加的記憶體耗用量。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 1.0 的負載因數是速度和大小之間的最佳平衡。A load factor of 1.0 is the best balance between speed and size. 當實際的載入因數達到指定的載入因數時，貯體數目會自動增加到大於兩次目前的貯體數目最小質數。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 雜湊程式碼提供者上精心篩選中的索引鍵的雜湊碼物件。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the object. 預設雜湊碼提供者是索引鍵的實作。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 預設比較子是索引鍵的實作。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 自訂的雜湊程式碼提供者和自訂比較子啟用的案例，例如執行查詢，使用不區分大小寫的字串。The custom hash code provider and the custom comparer enable scenarios such as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings. 新的項目都會依照相同的順序，在其中將列舉值逐一查看物件。The elements of the new are sorted in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the object. 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是中的項目數`d`參數。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `d` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用雜湊表建立為不同建構函式，並示範中的雜湊表中，行為的差異，即使每個包含相同的項目。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉值對集合並沒有獨佔存取，因此列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. 因為序列化和還原序列化的列舉值可能會導致要成為重新排序的項目，就無法繼續列舉型別，而不需呼叫方法。Because serializing and deserializing an enumerator for a can cause the elements to become reordered, it is not possible to continue enumeration without calling the method. ## Examples 下列範例會比較使用並`foreach`列舉的內容。The following example compares the use of and `foreach` to enumerate the contents of a . [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Hashtable Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable Example/VB/source2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小集合是唯讀的集合只會防止新增和移除項目; 的包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是可防止修改集合的包裝函式集合因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以同時支援一個寫入器和多個讀取器。A can support one writer and multiple readers concurrently. 若要支援多個寫入器，所有作業必須都透過包裝函式所傳回方法。To support multiple writers, all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method. 透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/VB/remarks.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列範例示範如何同步處理，判斷是否同步處理，並使用 同步處理。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[key]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 您也可以使用屬性來設定索引鍵的值加入新項目不存在於; 例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已存在於，將屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 金鑰不能是`null`，但是值可以是。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 區別`null`傳回因為找不到指定的索引鍵和`null`，就會傳回指定之索引鍵的值是因為`null`，使用方法或方法，可判斷索引鍵存在於清單中。To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method or the method to determine if the key exists in the list. 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 的作業;設定屬性，也是 o （1） 作業。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation. C#語言會使用[ `this` ](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md)關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the [`this`](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法具備執行緒安全之多個讀取器和寫入器。The method is thread safe for multiple readers and writers. 此外，同步處理的包裝函式可確保沒有撰寫一次只能有一個寫入器。Furthermore, the synchronized wrapper ensures that there is only one writer writing at a time. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何同步處理，判斷是否同步處理，並使用 同步處理。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立的同步處理的版本，使用方法。To create a synchronized version of the , use the method. 不過，在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的中，不要直接依賴。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理的其他執行緒可能同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/VB/remarks.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上，呼叫會擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫會擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更的集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值可能會無效，而且下次呼叫來或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator can be invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果集合已修改之間並，傳回設定為，項目，即使已經無效列舉值。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 列舉值對集合並沒有獨佔存取，因此列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中值的順序未指定，但它是做為相關聯的索引鍵中的相同順序所傳回方法。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the returned by the method. 傳回不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的值是指回。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the values in the original . 因此，變更才會反映在繼續。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
